message.name: ERR_EXISTING_PAGE_ID
message.locale: A page with the same id already exists.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_NON_EDIT_RECORD
message.locale: Only in-edit records can be modified.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVATE_NON_EDIT_RECORD
message.locale: Only in-edit records can be activated.

message.name: ERR_IN_EDIT_RECORD_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: An in-edit version of page already exists.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_IN_EDIT_NOT_ACTIVE
message.locale: An in-edit version can only be created from an active record.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_PAGE_ID
message.locale: Page ID is a mandatory field.

message.name: ERR_MANDATORY_PAGE_DEFINITION
message.locale: Page Definition is a mandatory field.
